titleStmt.title: Love's triumph, or, The royal union a tragedy / written by Edward Cooke, Esq., and dedicated to Her Highness the Princess of Orange.
titleStmt.author: Cooke, Edward, fl. 1678.
La Calprenède, Gaultier de Coste, seigneur de, d. 1663. Cassandre.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas James, and are to be sold by him ... and William Leach ...,

notesStmt.note: Based on: Cassandre / Gaultier de Coste La Calprenède.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Celebrates the marriage of Princess Mary and William of Orange, 1677.
